thread.title: Dirk Nowitzki asks: Who has the faster 40 time? Dirk or Peyton Manning?
thread.title_full: Dirk Nowitzki asks: Who has the faster 40 time? Dirk or Peyton Manning? | Dallas Morning News

author: SportsDayDFW.com
title: Dirk Nowitzki asks: Who has the faster 40 time? Dirk or Peyton Manning?
text:
Thursday night, Dirk Nowitzki posted an interesting question from a locker room debate on his Twitter account...
Had this debate the other day in the locker room: Who wins a 40 yard dash between me and Peyton Manning???
— Dirk Nowitzki (@swish41) October 23, 2015 Chandler Parsons and Von Miller of the Denver Broncos are on board - they want to know.
Yo @Millerlite40 make this happen! https://t.co/m0tHNSoweH
— Chandler Parsons (@ChandlerParsons) October 23, 2015
That would be epic! Over/under 5.7? I got Peyton by 1.5yds lolðŸ‚ https://t.co/2fc227hDvQ
— Von Miller (@Millerlite40) October 23, 2015
Lmao I got Dirk and it's not even close!!! We play in Denver twice in March! https://t.co/jrF533fEhJ
— Chandler Parsons (@ChandlerParsons) October 23, 2015 Dirk Nowitzki is 37 years old and has played over 45,000 minutes of NBA basketball.
Peyton Manning is 39 years old, has had multiple neck surgeries, and is in his 18th NFL season.
Who has the edge? Let's take a look at the tape:
Peyton Manning
Dirk Nowitzki
Somebody check their shoes, they might be on fire!
Dirk asked the question - so who you got?
Who wins the 40-yard dash?
On Twitter:
 @SportsDayDFW
